name: MR SEYI ADEDIRAN
detail: The Chairman of Equilibrium Insurance Broker was previously employed at Oxford Holding. Prior to that, he served as the Deputy Managing Director and Acting Managing Director of Alliance & General Insurance Plc. He was also an Executive Director of Sales and Marketing approved by NAICOM (National Insurance Commission).

name: DR. SINI KWABE
detail: Dr. Sini Kwabe, The Executive Vice Chairman of a leading insurance company, is a visionary and a Ph.D holder. He's known for innovative projects and mentors young professionals while collecting vintage architectural models in his free time.

name: MR. YORKINA BARITORGE GIDEON
detail: MR YORKINA GIDEON is an experienced Managing Director with a passion for leadership and innovation. He has successfully spearheaded numerous projects, demonstrating his strategic vision and commitment to excellence. Outside of work, he enjoys mentoring young professionals and contributing to community development initiatives.

name: ARC. NUREINI TEMITOPE
detail: Mr Nureni is known for his self-motivation, goal orientation, organizational skills, and efficiency. He holds a B.Sc. in Architecture and an M.Arch. From Obafemi Awolowo University, Ile-Ife, and an M.Sc. in Construction Management from the University of Lagos, Akoka. With 17 years of experience.

name: MR SEUN OWOLABI
detail: MR Owolabi Oluwaseun holds a B.Sc. Degree in Accounting at the University of Lagos, MSc finance with distinction at Caleb University and a fellow member of the Institute of Chartered Accountants of Nigeria. He is also an associate member of Chartered Insurance Institute of Nigeria and currently undergoing his PhD program.

name: SURV. OHIKHUEME ANTHONY
detail: Surv. Ohikhueme Anthony Ikhide MNIS is a Land Surveying (now Geomatics) graduate of the prestigious Ahmadu Bello University, Zaria. He has experience spanning close to two decades in the areas of Construction, Surveying, Land Development, Management and Administration, and Geographic Information Systems (GIS).

name: MISS PRISCILLA MZAMBER AGBA
detail: Miss Priscilla Agba is a committed HR and Administration professional with expertise in fostering positive workplace environments, streamlining administrative operations, and supporting employee development. Her office is organized with personnel records and team-building materials, reflecting her dedication to employee engagement and efficient management.
